hint.name: AboutDialog_copyLabel.Text
hint.source: Copyright @ 2016-{0} Steven M Cohn. All rights reserved.
hint.preferred: 版权所有 @ 2016-{0} Steven M Cohn。

hint.name: AboutDialog_githubLink.Text
hint.preferred: 在 GitHub 上查看项目

hint.name: AboutDialog_titleLabel.Text
hint.preferred: 适用 OneNote 的 OneMore 加载项

hint.name: AboutDialog_versionLabel.Text
hint.preferred: 插件版本 {0} 安装在 Onenote版本 {1}

hint.name: AddCaptionCommand_cannotCaptionBg
hint.source: Cannot add a caption to a background image on the page. Images must be in an outline container to be captioned.
hint.preferred: 无法为页面上的背景图像添加说明。图像必须位于容器中才能添加图片说明。

hint.name: AdjustImagesDialog_limitsBox.Text
hint.source: Resize all images Do not shrink larger images Do no enlarge smaller images
hint.preferred: 调整所有图像的大小 放大所有图像以达到最大图像的尺寸 缩小所有的图像以达到小图像尺寸

hint.name: AdjustImagesDialog_noImages
hint.source:
No images were found on this page.
Images must be in an outline container. Background images cannot be adjusted.
hint.preferred:
在此页面上未找到任何图像。
图像必须位于容器中。背景图像无法调整。

hint.name: AdjustImagesDialog_noImageToPaste
hint.source: PNG, JPG, GIF, BMP not found on the clipboard
hint.preferred: 剪贴板上找不到 PNG，JPG，GIF，BMP 格式的图像文件

hint.name: AdjustImagesDialog_styleBox.Text
hint.source: Original Gray scale Sepia Polaroid Invert
hint.preferred: 原图 灰度 棕褐色 宝丽来 反色

hint.name: AliasSheet_introBox.Text
hint.source: Define command aliases for use in the Command Palette.
hint.preferred: 定义命令别名，可在命令面板中输入别名来调用命令

hint.name: AnalyzeCommand_CacheSummary
hint.source: The cache is an internal directory managed by OneNote to optimize its performance. The recommendation is to avoid manually deleting the contents of the cache directory unless it becomes corrupted or hampers the operation of OneNote.
hint.preferred: 缓存文件是 OneNote 管理的一个内部目录，用于优化其性能。建议避免手动删除缓存目录的内容，除非它已经损坏或妨碍 OneNote 的运行。

hint.name: AnalyzeCommand_NoCache
hint.source: Cache not found; location likely changed in OneNote options
hint.preferred: 缓存未找到；缓存路径可能已经更改

hint.name: AnalyzeCommand_OrphanSummary
hint.source: Orphans are backup folders of notebooks that are no longer opened in OneNote. If they are no longer used, and you've confirmed that they are obsolete, they can be removed safely.
hint.preferred: 孤立文件是 OneNote 中不再打开的笔记本的备份文件夹。如果它们不再使用，并且您已确认它们已过时，则可以删除它们。

hint.name: AnalyzeCommand_PageSummary
hint.source: This is a detailed breakdown of each page showing the total size of the internal XML representation and the size of each image and file attachment. Images are shown in both "BinHex" XML sizes and native Bitmap sizes. Files are shown along with the amount of space they consume on disk.
hint.preferred: 这是每页的详细记录，显示了内部 XML 文件的总大小以及每个图像和文件附件的大小。图像以“BinHex”XML 大小和原生 Bitmap 大小显示，文件显示它们在磁盘上占用的空间量。

hint.name: AnalyzeCommand_SectionSummary
hint.source: The number of backup copies of each section is configured in the OneNote Options. This summarizes the sections per notebook, showing the size of each section's data file, the number of backup copies, and the total disk space consumed by all copies of each section.
hint.preferred: 每个分区的备份副本数量在 OneNote 选项中配置。这总结了每个笔记本的分区，显示了每个分区的数据文件的大小、备份副本的数量以及每个分区的所有副本占用的总磁盘空间。

hint.name: AnalyzeCommand_SummarySummary
hint.source: Notebooks can be stored locally or remotely on OneDrive. Remote notebooks can only be analyzed by their local backups as configured in the OneNote Options. This summary shows the total disk usage in either the data location for local notebooks or the backup location for remote notebooks including all backup copies and the per-notebook recycle bins.
hint.preferred: 笔记本可以本地存储或存储在 OneDrive 上。远程笔记本只能通过 OneNote 选项中配置的本地备份进行分析。此摘要显示了本地笔记本的数据位置或远程笔记本的本地备份的磁盘使用总量，包括所有备份副本和每个笔记本的回收站的占用空间。

hint.name: AnalyzeDialog_allDetailsBox.Text
hint.source: Include page details for all sections in this notebook
hint.preferred: 包含此笔记本中所有分区的页面详细信息

hint.name: AnalyzeDialog_sectionDetailsBox.Text
hint.source: Include page details for current section
hint.preferred: 包含当前部分的页面详细信息

hint.name: AnalyzeDialog_warningLabel.Text
hint.preferred: 报告生成可能需要几分钟

hint.name: ApplyTableTheme_SelectTable
hint.source: Move the text cursor into a table cell
hint.preferred: 请对要设置的表格的单元格激活文本光标

hint.name: ArrangeContainersDialog_flowButton.Text
hint.source: Arrange in columns and then rows, fit to page width
hint.preferred: 先列后行排列，并匹配页面宽度

hint.name: BiLinkCommand_BadAnchor
hint.source: Could not mark anchor point. Select a word or phrase from one paragraph. See log file for details.
hint.preferred: 无法标记锚点。请选择至少一个单词或文字作为锚点。请参阅日志文件以获取详细信息

hint.name: BiLinkCommand_Circular
hint.source: Cannot link a phrase to itself

hint.name: BiLinkCommand_Marked
hint.source: Marked "{0}" as the anchor. Now select the target text and finish the bi-directional link

hint.name: BiLinkCommand_NoTarget
hint.source: Select a word or phrase from one paragraph
hint.preferred: 选择至少一个单词或文字作为锚点

hint.name: Calculator_ErrMissingRowColVars
hint.source: The {0} function requires the col and row variables
hint.preferred: {0} 函数需要 行和列 参数

hint.name: Clipboard_locked
hint.source: Cannot copy at this time. The clipboard is locked.
hint.preferred: 无法复制。剪贴板已锁定。

hint.name: ColorizerSheet_applyBox.Text
hint.source: Always apply the following fonts when colorizing code
hint.preferred: 代码着色时格式化为以下字体

hint.name: ColorizerSheet_introBox.Text
hint.source: Customize the behavior of the Colorize command. Secondary font applies when collapsing PlantUML
hint.preferred: 设置代码着色命令的行为。 绘制plantuml图时需指定次要字体

hint.name: ColorsSheet_introBox.Text
hint.source: Customize the default style for horizontal line snippets and task marked by the Strike-Through Completed To Do Tags command
hint.preferred: 自定义待办事项标签默认样式

hint.name: ContextMenuSheet_introBox.Text
hint.source: Choose commands to display in the Page context menu. Menu items include all commands in that menu. Restart OneNote to see changes. If you choose one of the "menu" options such as "Edit Menu" then that will be added as a fly-out menu and include all Edit Menu items. But if you choose one of the sub-items, such as "To lowercase" then that item will be added as a top-level context menu item. If you happen to select both then both will be shown, possibly duplicating items.
hint.preferred: 选择要在页面中上下文菜单（右键菜单）中显示的命令。一级选项包含所有子选项。重新启动 OneNote 以查看更改。如果您选择一级选项，例如“编辑”菜单，那么它将作为弹出菜单添加并包括所有“编辑”子选项。如果您选择一级选项中的其中一个子项，例如“小写”，那么该项将单独添加到上下文菜单。如果您同时选择了两者，那么两者都会显示。

hint.name: ConvertImagesCommand_NoImages
hint.preferred: 没有发现可压缩的图像

hint.name: CrawlWebPageDialog_introBox.Text
hint.source: Select links to import as sub-pages. These will be relinked to from this page.
hint.preferred: 选择链接，将链接对应的网页导入为子页面。这些子页面将链接到当前页面。

hint.name: CrawlWebPageDialog_rewireBox.Text
hint.preferred: 将子页面重新链接到当前页面

hint.name: CrawlWebPageDialog_useTextBox.Text
hint.source: Apply Text columns to sub-page titles
hint.preferred: 子页面标题使用Text列内容

hint.name: CreatePagesCommand_NoNamesFound
hint.source: A name list was not found on the page
hint.preferred: 请选择包含页面名的表格区域

hint.name: CropImageDialog_bounds
hint.source: Selection top left: {0}, {1}. Bounding rectangle size: {2} x {3}.
hint.preferred: 选择区域左上角坐标：{0}，{1}。 区域尺寸：{2} x {3}。

hint.name: CropImageDialog_printout
hint.source: This image is from a printout. If it is cropped, it will no longer be associated with that original file. Do you want to continue cropping?
hint.preferred: 这张图片来自打印输出。如果对它裁剪，它将不再与原始文件关联。您要继续裁剪吗？

hint.name: DeleteFormulaCommand_NoFormulas
hint.source: Formula not found. Select one or more table cells containing formulas.
hint.preferred: 找不到公式。请选择一个或多个包含公式的单元格。

hint.name: DeleteReminderCommand_deleteTag
hint.source: About to delete reminder. Would you also like to delete the tag associated with this reminder?
hint.preferred: 确认删除此提醒。是否同时删除与此提醒关联的标签？

hint.name: DiagramCommand_broken
hint.source: Diagram text is either invalid or cannot find connection between text and image
hint.preferred: 示意图对象无效或无法找到示意图代码文本和图像之间的连接

hint.name: DiagramCommand_EmptySelection
hint.source: Empty selection. Select a valid block of diagram text.
hint.preferred: 选择为空。请选择有效的示意图容器块。

hint.name: EditTableThemesDialog_elements
hint.source: Whole Table First Column Stripe Second Column Stripe First Row Stripe Second Row Stripe First Column Last Column Header Row Total Row Header First Cell Header Last Cell Total Row First Cell Total Row Last Cell
hint.preferred: 整个表格 第一列条纹 第二列条纹 第一行条纹 第二行条纹 第一列 最后一列 标题行 汇总行 第一个标题单元格 最后一个标题单元格 第一个汇总单元格 最后一个汇总单元格

hint.name: EditTableThemesDialog_fontElements
hint.source: Default Font Header Row Font Total Row Font First Column Font Last Column Font
hint.preferred: 默认字体 标题行字体 汇总行字体 第一列字体 最后一列字体

hint.name: Error_BodyContext
hint.source: Text focus must be in the body of the page
hint.preferred: 文字焦点必须激活在页面的正文文本中

hint.name: Error_CursorContext
hint.source: Position the cursor in the body of the page without selecting a range of text
hint.preferred: 将光标放置在页面正文中，而无需选择一串文本

hint.name: ExpandoCommand_Saved
hint.source: Outline state has been saved for this page

hint.name: Favorites_suspect
hint.source: Page not found; it may have been renamed or moved
hint.preferred: 找不到页面；可能已重命名或被删除

hint.name: Favorites_unknown
hint.source: Page no longer found; it may have been deleted
hint.preferred: 找不到页面；可能已重命名或被删除

hint.name: FavoritesSheet_shortcutsBox.Text
hint.source: Include reference to keyboard shortcuts page
hint.preferred: 启用快捷键页面生成功能

hint.name: FileQuickNotesCommand_noQuickNotes
hint.source: Could not load Quick Notes. Check the location in OneNote Options.
hint.preferred: 无法加载快速笔记。请检查 OneNote 设置。

hint.name: FileQuickNotesCommand_noTargetSection
hint.source: Cannot find target section. Open OneMore Settings to specify a target.
hint.preferred: 找不到目标分区。打开 OneMore 设置以指定目标。

hint.name: FitGridToTextCommand_noGrid
hint.source: Enable grid lines before using this command
hint.preferred: 使用此命令前请先启用网格线

hint.name: FitGridToTextDialog_autoButton.Text
hint.source: Automatically adjust grid to most common font size
hint.preferred: 自动将单元格调整为最常见的字体大小

hint.name: FitGridToTextDialog_Text
hint.preferred: 调整单元格以适应文本

hint.name: FormulaDialog_helpBox.Text
hint.source:
Formula apply to the first selected cell and are incremented automatically for additional selected cells.
Functions: abs, acos, arccos, arcsin, arctan, asin, atan, atan2, average, ceil, ceiling, cos, cosh, exp, floor, log, log10, max, median, min, mode, pow, range, rem, root, round, sign, sin, sinh, sqrt, stdev, sum, tan, tanh, trunc, truncate, and variance.
Operators: + - / * ^ % Variables: e, phi, pi, tao, tablecols, tablerows Cell reference: A1, A2, ... ZZZ999 Cell range: A1:A22 Relative ranges: A1:cell(0,-1)
hint.preferred:
公式应用于第一个选定的单元格，并对其他选定的单元格自动递增。
函数：abs, acos, arccos, arcsin, arctan, asin, atan, atan2, average, ceil, ceiling, cos, cosh, exp, floor, log, log10, max, median, min, mode, pow, range, rem, root, round, sign, sin, sinh, sqrt, stdev, sum, tan, tanh, trunc, truncate, variance
运算符： + - / * ^％ 内置变量：E，Phi，Pi，Tao，Tablecols，Tablerows 单元格：A1，A2，... ZZZ999 单元格范围：A1：A22 相对单元格范围：A1:cell(0,-1)

hint.name: GeneralSheet_introBox.Text
hint.source: Customize the overall behavior of OneMore

hint.name: GeneralSheet_sequentialBox.Text
hint.source: Allow nonsequential name matching in Command Palettes
hint.preferred: 允许命令面板中的关键词非连续匹配

hint.name: GeneralSheet_themeBox.Text
hint.preferred: 跟随系统 亮色 暗色

hint.name: GetImagesCommand_Cite
hint.source: Would you like to annotate the image with its URL?
hint.preferred: 是否使用图像URL作为图像说明文本？

hint.name: HashtagCommand_waiting
hint.source:
Your hashtag catalog is scheduled to be created on {0}. You can change this schedule from the OneMore Tray application.
Searching for hashtags is unavailable until this is completed.
hint.preferred:
您的主题标签目录计划于 {0} 创建。您可以在任务栏中的 OneMore 应用程序更改此计划。
在完成此操作之前，无法搜索主题标签。

hint.name: HashtagDialog_badLink
hint.source: Cannot navigate to this page. It may have been deleted
hint.preferred: 无法跳转到此页面。此页面可能已被删除

hint.name: HashtagDialog_introLabel.Text
hint.source: Type any part of one or more hashtags. Wildcards are implied unless a tag is ended with a period. Parenthesis and logical operators are allowed.
hint.preferred: 输入一个或多个主题标签的任意部分。若标签不以句号结束，则隐含通配符。允许使用括号和逻辑运算符。

hint.name: HashtagDialog_scanLink.Text
hint.source: New notebooks discovered. Click here to scan.
hint.preferred: 发现新笔记本。点击这里开始扫描。

hint.name: HashtagDialog_scopeBox.Text
hint.source: All notebooks This notebook This section This page
hint.preferred: 所有笔记本 这个笔记本 本分区 本页面

hint.name: HashtaggerDialog_bankBox.Text
hint.source: Add to tag bank at top of page
hint.preferred: 添加到页面顶部的标签容器

hint.name: HashtaggerDialog_showRecentMenuItem
hint.preferred: 显示最近使用过的内容

hint.name: HashtagSheet_disabledBox.Text
hint.source: Disable the hashtag service. This will also disable hashtag searching.
hint.preferred: 禁用主题标签服务。这会使主题标签搜索功能也不可用。

hint.name: HashtagSheet_introBox.Text
hint.source: Customize advanced options for the Hashtag Scanner Service
hint.preferred: 设置标签扫描服务高级选项

hint.name: HashtagSheet_scanNotebooks
hint.source: Schedule an incremental scan of your newly added notebooks
hint.preferred: 添加对新添加的笔记本进行增量扫描的计划

hint.name: HashtagSheet_scheduleLink.Text
hint.source: Schedule Hashtag Scanning or Scan Now
hint.preferred: 立即扫描或添加扫描计划

hint.name: HashtagSheet_upgradeLink.Text
hint.source: Upgrade page tags to inline hashtags
hint.preferred: 将页面标签转换为主题标签

hint.name: HighlightsSheet_introBox.Text
hint.source: The highlighter command will cycle through the colors of the chosen theme. Colors shown here are for light background pages. Dark background pages use automatic highlight colors
hint.preferred: 荧光高亮命令将循环切换所选的主题颜色。

hint.name: ImagesSheet_imageViewerLabel.Text
hint.source: External image viewer (leave blank to use system default)
hint.preferred: 外部图像查看器（留空则使用系统默认）

hint.name: ImagesSheet_introBox.Text
hint.source: Customize the defaults for Image commands

hint.name: ImagesSheet_plantRemoveBox.Text
hint.source: Remove PlantUML text and embed it in the image
hint.preferred: 插入 PlantUML 图像，并删除对应代码文本

hint.name: ImagesSheet_plantUriLabel.Text
hint.source: PlantUML Server Address (leave blank to use default)
hint.preferred: Plantuml 服务器地址（留空以使用默认）

hint.name: ImportDialog_notInstalledLabel.Text
hint.source: The required Office product is not installed
hint.preferred: 未安装所需的 Office 软件

hint.name: ImportDialog_powerSectionButton.Text
hint.source: Create a new section with a page for each slide
hint.preferred: 为每张幻灯片创建一个带有页面的新分区

hint.name: ImportOutlookTasksDialog_introBox.Text
hint.source: Choose an entire folder or individual tasks to import from Outlook into OneNote. Disabled items indicate tasks already linked to OneNote
hint.preferred: 选择要从 Outlook 导入 OneNote 的整个文件夹或单个任务。不可选的项目已经链接到Onenote中。

hint.name: ImportOutlookTasksDialog_warningBox.Text
hint.source: Note that OneNote does not bind completely to task that are not in the Outlook Tasks folder. Tasks from sub-folders are shown in red to indicate that their status flags will not update automatically after importing.
hint.preferred: 请注意，OneNote 不会完全绑定到不在 Outlook 主任务文件夹中的任务。在Outlook子文件夹中的任务不会自动更新，并已用红色标出

hint.name: ImportWebDialog_newChildButton.Text
hint.source: Create as new child of current page
hint.preferred: 添加到当前页面的子页面

hint.name: InsertQRCommand_NoSelection
hint.source: Select text to render as a new QR code
hint.preferred: 选择要转换为二维码的文本

hint.name: InsertSnippets_CouldNotLoad
hint.preferred: 无法加载来自“{0}”的代码段

hint.name: InsertTocDialog_notebookRadio.Text
hint.source: New page with index of sections in this notebook
hint.preferred: 插入到新页面，包含此笔记本中各分区的目录

hint.name: InsertTocDialog_pageRadio.Text
hint.source: Insert table of headings on this page
hint.preferred: 插入到当前页面，包含此页面各级标题的目录

hint.name: InsertTocDialog_pagesBox.Text
hint.preferred: 包含各个分区中的子页面

hint.name: InsertTocDialog_sectionRadio.Text
hint.source: New page with index of pages in this section
hint.preferred: 插入到新页面，包含此分区的页面目录

hint.name: InsertTocDialog_timeBox
hint.preferred: 更新各页面标题的日期和时间

hint.name: InsertTocDialog_topBox.Text
hint.source: Add link to each heading to jump to top of page
hint.preferred: 为每个页面标题添加跳转链接

hint.name: InsertTocForNotebook_RefreshQuestion
hint.source:
There is a table of contents page for this notebook. You can refresh that page or create a new page.
Do you want to refresh the existing page?
hint.preferred:
此笔记本有一个目录页。您可以刷新该页面或创建新目录页。
您想刷新现有目录页吗？

hint.name: InsertTocForPage_ClearToc
hint.source:
There are no headings on this page. However, there is a table of contents.
Would you like to remove the table of contents from this page?
hint.preferred:
此页面上没有标题。但是有一个目录。
您想删除此页面的目录吗？

hint.name: InsertTocForSection_RefreshQuestion
hint.source:
There is a table of contents page for this section. You can refresh that page or create a new page.
Do you want to refresh the existing page?
hint.preferred:
此分区有一个目录页。您可以刷新该页面或创建新目录页。
您想刷新现有目录页面吗？

hint.name: KeyboardSheet_introBox.Text
hint.source: Manage my custom keyboard shortcuts. Select a command and press a key sequence.
hint.preferred: 自定义键盘快捷键。选中一个命令，然后输入快捷键。

hint.name: NavigatorSheet_corrallBox.Text
hint.source: Restrict the Navigator window to the active screen
hint.preferred: 导航器窗口仅显示当前活动Onenote窗口的内容

hint.name: NavigatorSheet_depthLabel.Text
hint.preferred: 存储的最大历史记录数

hint.name: NavigatorSheet_elevateBox.Text
hint.source: Elevate Navigator when OneNote is elevated
hint.preferred: 打开Onenote界面时同时打开导航窗口

hint.name: NavigatorSheet_introBox.Text
hint.source: Customize advanced options for the Navigator Service
hint.preferred: 自定义导航服务及导航窗口的高级选项

hint.name: phrase_AllSectionInTheCurrentNotebook
hint.source: All sections in the current notebook
hint.preferred: 当前笔记本中的所有分区

hint.name: Plugin_NoUpdate
hint.source: Error updating page. See log file
hint.preferred: 更新页面时出错。 请参阅日志文件。

hint.name: PluginDialog_childBox.Text
hint.source: Create as child of current page
hint.preferred: 创建为当前页面的子页面

hint.name: PluginDialog_failLockRadio.Text
hint.source: Fail if any section is locked
hint.preferred: 如果目标文件中任意内容被锁定，则返回失败

hint.name: PluginDialog_nameTip
hint.source: The keyword $name will be replaced automatically with the page name when running this plugin
hint.preferred: 运行此插件时，关键字 $name 将自动替换为页面名称。

hint.name: PluginDialog_targetBox.Text
hint.source: Current page Current section and its pages Current notebook and its sections Current notebook and its pages All notebooks and their pages
hint.preferred: 当前页面 当前分区及其页面 当前笔记本及其分区 当前笔记本及其页面 所有笔记本及其页面

hint.name: PluginDialog_trialBox.Text
hint.source: Trial run - keep cache file and do not update OneNote
hint.preferred: 试运行-保留缓存文件但不更新 onenote 文件

hint.name: PronunciateDialog_languages
hint.source: en,English hi,Hindi es,Spanish fr,French ja,Japanese ru,Russian de,German it,Italian ko,Korean pt-BR,Brazilian Portuguese ar,Arabic tr,Turkish zh-CN,Chinese (Simplified)
hint.preferred: en,英语 hi,印地语 es,西班牙语 fr,法语 ja,日语 ru,俄语 de,德语 it,意大利语 ko,韩语 pt-BR,巴西葡萄牙语 ar,阿拉伯语 tr,土耳其语 zh-CN,中文（简体）

hint.name: QuickNotesSheet_introBox.Text
hint.source: Custom the behavior of the Organize Quick Notes command
hint.preferred: 设置快速笔记命令的行为

hint.name: QuickNotesSheet_sectionButton.Text
hint.source: Move Quick Notes into this section
hint.preferred: 将快速注释移至此分区

hint.name: QuickNotesSheet_SelectNotebookIntro
hint.source: Select the notebook used to organize your Quick Notes
hint.preferred: 选择存放快速笔记的笔记本

hint.name: QuickNotesSheet_SelectSectionIntro
hint.source: Select the section used to organize your Quick Notes
hint.preferred: 选择存放快速笔记的分区

hint.name: QuickPaletteCommand_basics
hint.source: Bold Italic Underline Strikethrough Subscript Superscript
hint.preferred: 加粗 斜体 强调 删除线 下标 上标

hint.name: QuickPaletteCommand_colors
hint.source: Blue Green Orange Purple Red Yellow
hint.preferred: 蓝色 绿色 橙色 紫色 红色 黄色

hint.name: QuickPaletteCommand_highlights
hint.source: Blue Highlight Green Highlight Orange Highlight Purple Highlight Red Highlight Yellow Highlight
hint.preferred: 蓝色高亮 绿色高亮 橙色高亮 紫色高亮 红色高亮 黄色高亮

hint.name: RemindCommand_noReminder
hint.source: There is no reminder on this paragraph
hint.preferred: 这一段中不含任务提醒块

hint.name: RemindDialog_snoozeBox.Items
hint.source: Do not snooze 5 minutes 10 minutes 15 minutes 30 minutes 1 hour 2 hours 4 hours 1 day 2 days 3 days 1 week 2 weeks
hint.preferred: 不设置 5分钟 10分钟 15分钟 30分钟 1小时 2小时 4个小时 1天 2天 3天 1周 2周

hint.name: RemindDialog_snoozeLabel.Text
hint.source: Click snooze to be reminded in

hint.name: RemindDialog_statusBox.Text
hint.source: Not started In progress Completed Waiting on someone else Deferred
hint.preferred: 未开始 进行中 已完成 等待协作人 延期

hint.name: ReminderReport_ActiveSummary
hint.source: These are reminders not yet completed or deferred and ordered by due date year, week of year, and priority
hint.preferred: 这些是尚未完成或推迟的提醒，按截止日期的年份、周数和优先级排序

hint.name: ReminderReport_InactiveSummary
hint.source: These are reminders that have been completed or deferred and ordered by status, completion date, and priority
hint.preferred: 这些是尚未完成或推迟的提醒，按截止日期的年份、周数和优先级排序

hint.name: ribAboutButton_Screentip
hint.preferred: 显示有关 OneMore 插件的信息

hint.name: ribAddCaptionButton_Screentip
hint.preferred: 在所选图像底部添加说明文字

hint.name: ribAddFavoriteSectionButton_Screentip
hint.preferred: 将分区添加到收藏夹菜单

hint.name: ribAddTagBankButton_Screentip
hint.preferred: 在页面顶部添加标签块

hint.name: ribAdjustImagesButton_Screentip
hint.preferred: 调整所选图像的大小与样式

hint.name: RibbonBarSheet_editIconBox.Text
hint.source: Show only icons for edit commands

hint.name: RibbonBarSheet_formulaIconBox.Text
hint.source: Show only icons for formula commands

hint.name: RibbonBarSheet_hashtagsIconBox.Text
hint.source: Show only icons for hashtag commands

hint.name: RibbonBarSheet_introBox.Text
hint.source: Choose optional preset grouping to add to the ribbon bar
hint.preferred: 还可添加以下预设分组

hint.name: RibbonBarSheet_layoutBox.Text
hint.source: Aa a group in the Home tab As a separate OneMore tab
hint.preferred: 主页选项卡中的一个组 单独的 OneMore 选项卡

hint.name: RibbonBarSheet_positionBox.Text
hint.source: Clipboard Group Basic Text Group Styles Group Tags Group Email Group Meetings Group After last group
hint.preferred: 剪贴板组 普通文本组 样式组 标记组 电子邮件组 会议组 最后一组之后

hint.name: RibbonBarSheet_positionIntroLabel.Text
hint.source: Select the location of the OneMore ribbon group.
hint.preferred: 设置 OneMore 插件的显示方式、功能区组的位置

hint.name: RibbonBarSheet_positionTabBox.Text
hint.source: Home Tab Insert Tab Draw Tab History Tab Review Tab View Tab Help Tab
hint.preferred: 开始选项卡 插入选项卡 绘图选项卡 历史记录选项卡 审阅选项卡 视图选项卡 帮助选项卡

hint.name: ribCalendarButton_Screentip
hint.preferred: 打开 OneMore 日历应用

hint.name: ribClearTableShadingButton_Screentip
hint.source: Reset shading in all cells in the current table
hint.preferred: 清除当前表格中所有单元格的样式

hint.name: ribConvertMarkdownButton_Screentip
hint.source: Convert page or selected markdown to OneNote format
hint.preferred: 将页面或选定的 Markdown 内容转换为 OneNote 格式

hint.name: ribCopyAcrossButton_Screentip
hint.source: Copy content across the selected rows
hint.preferred: 对所选的表格区域，每一行填充第一列的内容

hint.name: ribCopyAsTextButton_Screentip
hint.source: Copy select context as plain text
hint.preferred: 将所选内容复制为纯文本

hint.name: ribCopyDownButton_Screentip
hint.source: Copy content down the selected columns
hint.preferred: 对所选的表格区域，每一列填充第一行的内容

hint.name: ribCrawlWebPageButton_Screentip
hint.preferred: 将超链接对应的网页导入为新页面

hint.name: ribCropImageButton_Screentip
hint.preferred: 对所选图像进行裁剪和旋转

hint.name: ribDeleteFormulaButton_Screentip
hint.source: Delete formula from selected table cell(s)
hint.preferred: 删除选定的表格单元格中的公式

hint.name: ribDisableSpellCheckButton_Screentip
hint.source: Disable spell checking within selected content
hint.preferred: 对所选内容禁用拼写检查

hint.name: ribDuplicateLineButton_Screentip
hint.preferred: 将当前段落复制为新段落

hint.name: ribEnableSpellCheckButton_Screentip
hint.source: Enable spell check within selected content
hint.preferred: 对所选内容启用拼写检查

hint.name: ribFillAcrossButton_Screentip
hint.preferred: 对所选的表格区域，每一行向右填充数字序列

hint.name: ribFillDownButton_Screentip
hint.source: Fill sequence down selected columns (Ctrl + D)
hint.preferred: 对所选的表格区域，每一列向下填充数字序列

hint.name: ribHashtaggerButton_Screentip
hint.source: Pick from a smart list of words and tags to insert hashtags
hint.preferred: 从智能单词和标签列表中创建主题标签

hint.name: ribHighlightButton_Screentip
hint.source: Highligt text with a rotating highlighter
hint.preferred: 使用荧光笔标记选中文本

hint.name: ribIncreaseFontSizeButton_Screentip
hint.source: Increase page font size (Ctrl + Alt + Plus)
hint.preferred: 放大页面字体大小 (Ctrl + Alt + Plus)

hint.name: ribInsertBreadcrumbButton_Screentip
hint.source: Insert breadcrumb of page location at top of page
hint.preferred: 在页面顶部插入面包屑样式页面路径

hint.name: ribInsertCodeBoxButton_Screentip
hint.source: Insert a code box (F6), wrapping selected content
hint.preferred: 插入代码块（F6），包裹选中的内容

hint.name: ribInsertDateButton_Screentip
hint.source: Insert the current date (Ctrl + Shift + D)
hint.preferred: 插入当前日期：年-月-日格式（Ctrl + Shift + D）

hint.name: ribInsertTextBoxButton_Screentip
hint.source: Insert a single-cell table, wrapping selected text
hint.preferred: 将选定文字插入只有一个单元格的、换行显示的表格

hint.name: ribInsertTimerButton_Screentip
hint.preferred: 插入显示计时器时间值的容器

hint.name: ribJoinParagraphButton_Screentip
hint.preferred: 将选中的多个段落合并为一个段落

hint.name: ribMermaidButton_Screentip
hint.source: Render Mermaid image from selected text
hint.preferred: 根据选定的代码渲染 Mermaid 示意图

hint.name: ribNewStyleButton_Screentip
hint.source: Create a new style from the current selection
hint.preferred: 根据当前选择的内容创建新样式

hint.name: ribNextUnreadPageButton_Screentip
hint.source: Move to the next unread page
hint.preferred: 跳转至下一个未读页面

hint.name: ribNumberPagesButton_Screentip
hint.source: Add or update number of all pages in this section
hint.preferred: 添加或更新此分区中所有页面的编号

hint.name: ribNumberSectionsButton_Screentip
hint.source: Add or update numbering of all sections in this notebook
hint.preferred: 添加或更新此笔记本中所有分区的编号

hint.name: ribOutlineButton_Screentip
hint.preferred: 添加或更新此页面中的标题文本

hint.name: ribPasteImageButton_Screentip
hint.source: Adjust and paste image from clipboard
hint.preferred: 调整并粘贴剪贴板图像

hint.name: ribPasteRtfButton_Screentip
hint.preferred: 粘贴并保留文本格式 (Ctrl + Alt + V)

hint.name: ribPasteTextButton_Screentip
hint.source: Paste and Keep Text Only (Ctrl + Shift + V)
hint.preferred: 粘贴为纯文本 (Ctrl + Shift + V)

hint.name: ribPlantUmlButton_Screentip
hint.source: Render PlantUML or Graphviz image from selected text
hint.preferred: 根据选定的代码渲染 PlantUML 或 Graphviz 图像

hint.name: ribPreviousUnreadPageButton_Screentip
hint.source: Move to the previous unread page
hint.preferred: 跳转至上一个未读页面

hint.name: ribRemovePageNumbersButton_Screentip
hint.source: Remove numbers from all pages in this section
hint.preferred: 删除此分区中所有页面的页面编号

hint.name: ribRemoveSectionNumbersButton_Screentip
hint.source: Remove numbers from all sectionsin this notebook
hint.preferred: 删除此笔记本中所有分区的编号

hint.name: ribRemoveTagBankButton_Screentip
hint.preferred: 删除页面顶部的标签块

hint.name: ribReplayButton_Screentip
hint.preferred: 重做上一个命令 (Alt + Shift + R)

hint.name: ribRestartTimerButton_Screentip
hint.source: Restart the Timer, setting it back to zero
hint.preferred: 重置计时器，将其计时复位为0

hint.name: ribSaveSnippetButton_Screentip
hint.source: Save a new snippet from the selected content
hint.preferred: 将所选内容保存为新的自定义片段

hint.name: ribSearchAndReplaceButton_Screentip
hint.preferred: 搜索和替换主题标签内容 (Ctrl + H)

hint.name: ribSelectImagesButton_Screentip
hint.source: Select all images on the page
hint.preferred: 选中此页面上的所有图像

hint.name: ribSelectInkButton_Screentip
hint.source: Select all ink on the page
hint.preferred: 选中此页面上的所有墨迹

hint.name: ribSelectStyleButton_Screentip
hint.preferred: 选中与选中文本格式相似的文本

hint.name: ribSortListButton_Screentip
hint.preferred: 对选中列表中的内容进行排序

hint.name: ribSplitButton_Screentip
hint.source: Split page at Heading 1 into multiple pages
hint.preferred: 将页面根据标题1拆分为多个页面

hint.name: ribStackBackgroundImagesButton_Screentip
hint.source: Reposition background images top to bottom
hint.preferred: 重新调整背景图像位置以消除重叠和空隙

hint.name: ribStylizeImagesButton_Screentip
hint.preferred: 对所选图像使用选定的风格重新重色

hint.name: ribTitlecaseButton_Label
hint.preferred: 转换为标题大小写格式

hint.name: ribTitlecaseButton_Screentip
hint.preferred: 将选中文本转换为标题大小写格式(主要单词首字母大写)

hint.name: ribTrimButton_Screentip
hint.source: Trim trailing whitespace from selected text
hint.preferred: 删除所选文本末尾的空格

hint.name: ribTrimLeadingButton_Screentip
hint.source: Trim leading whitespace from selected text
hint.preferred: 删除所选文本开头的空格

hint.name: ScanDialog_colorBox
hint.preferred: 彩色 灰度 黑白

hint.name: ScheduleScanDialog_booksInfoLabel.Text
hint.source: Select notebooks to schedule for a full rescan
hint.preferred: 选择整本笔记本以对整本笔记本进行完整的重扫描

hint.name: ScheduleScanDialog_introBox.Text
hint.source: The hashtag catalog has not yet been created. Choose below when OneMore should build the catalog.
hint.preferred: 主题标签索引目录尚未创建。在下面设置何时 OneMore 应自动构建目录。

hint.name: ScheduleScanDialog_laterRadio.Text
hint.source: Schedule the scan at a later time

hint.name: ScheduleScanDialog_neverScanned
hint.preferred: 从不扫描或不添加标签

hint.name: SearchAndReplaceDialog_scopBox
hint.source: This page This section This notebook All notebooks
hint.preferred: 此页面 此分区 此笔记本 所有笔记本

hint.name: SearchDialogText_scopeOptions
hint.source: In this notebook In this section On this page
hint.preferred: 在此笔记本中 在此分区中 在此页面上

hint.name: SearchEngineSheet_introBox.Text
hint.source:
URL Patterns must contain a string replacement token, such as &q={0}
Search engines will appear in the page context menu, right-click.
hint.preferred:
设置的网址格式中必须包含一个字符串更换令牌，例如＆q = {0}
搜索引擎将出现在页面右键的弹出“上下文菜单”中。

hint.name: SettingsDialog_Restart
hint.source: One or more changes require OneNote to be restarted. Do you want to restart OneNote now?
hint.preferred: 一项或多项更改需要重新启动 OneNote 才能生效。

hint.name: ShowXmlDialog_linefeedBox.Text
hint.preferred: 删除 CDATA 属性中的换行符 LF

hint.name: ShowXmlDialog_saveWindowBox.Text
hint.preferred: 保存此窗口的位置和大小

hint.name: ShowXmlDialog_WARNING
hint.source:
This is a dangerous operation!
Incorrect changes may result in lost data.
Are you sure you want to continue?
hint.preferred:
这是危险的操作！
不正确的更改可能会导致数据丢失。
确定要继续吗？

hint.name: SortDialog_pinNotesBox.Text
hint.source: Pin Notes to top and Quick Notes to bottom
hint.preferred: 将普通笔记固定在顶部 并将快速笔记放在尾部

hint.name: SortDialog_scopeBox.Items
hint.source: Children of Current Page Pages in this section Sections in this notebook Sections in this group Notebooks
hint.preferred: 当前页面的子项 此分区中的页面 此笔记本中的分区 此组中的分区 所有笔记本

hint.name: SplitDialog_byHeading1Box.Text
hint.preferred: 根据标题1生成多个页面

hint.name: SplitDialog_taggedBox.Text
hint.source: Apply only to tagged headings and links
hint.preferred: 仅应用到有标记的标题和链接

hint.name: StyleDialog_darkBox.Text
hint.source: Intended for pages with dark backgrounds
hint.preferred: 使用适用于深色页面的背景色

hint.name: StyleDialog_pageColorBox.Text
hint.source: Change the page color when applying these styles
hint.preferred: 应用样式时更新关联文本的页面颜色

hint.name: StyleDialog_pageColorLink.Text
hint.source: Click here to select the page color

hint.name: StyleDialog_styleTypeBox_Items
hint.source: Character - words in paragraph Paragraph - entire paragraph Heading - include in TOC
hint.preferred: 字符-段落中的文字 段落-整个段落 标题-整个页面

hint.name: StylizeImagesDialog_backBox.Text
hint.source: Apply to background images Background images: {0}, selected: {1}
hint.preferred: 应用于背景图像 背景图片：共 {0}，已选择：{1}

hint.name: StylizeImagesDialog_foreBox.Text
hint.source: Apply to foreground images Foreground images: {0}, selected: {1}
hint.preferred: 应用于前景图像 前景图像：共{0}，已选择：{1}

hint.name: StylizeImagesDialog_styleBox.Text
hint.preferred: 灰度 棕褐色 宝丽来 反色

hint.name: TagBankCommand_confirm
hint.source: The tag bank contains text. Are you sure you want to remove it?
hint.preferred: 标签库非空。您确定要删除它吗？

hint.name: VariablesSheet_doubleWarning
hint.source: Please enter a valid double value
hint.preferred: 请输入有效的双变量值

hint.name: VariablesSheet_introBox.Text
hint.source: Define your own variables for use in table formulas
hint.preferred: 定义以用于表格公式的自定义变量

hint.name: WordCounts_NotebookTotal
hint.source: Total words in notebook across {0} pages
hint.preferred: 此笔记本共 {0} 页包含总字数

hint.name: WordCounts_SectionTotal
hint.source: Total words in section across {0} pages
hint.preferred: 此分区共 {0} 页包含总字数
